title: Maria's Good Food
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Italian, Organic, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small Italian restaurant serves made-in-house food, mostly organic, including some vegan dishes. Also has gluten free items. Dishes include pasta, piadas (Italian flatbreads), salad, soups and vegan/GF cakes. Italian coffee also available, as well as teas and soft drinks. Maria runs the cafe solo, cooking all her food by hand, from scratch. Sit in (6-10 seats) or take away. Specialties prepared on demand. Homey, welcoming atmosphere.
